sentences.en: a deal was being hammered out with the Dutch museums.
sentences.cn: 正在悉力与荷兰博物馆达成一笔交易。

sentences.en: Beth spoke of Dr. Hammer in laudatory terms.
sentences.cn: 贝丝谈及哈默医生时赞不绝口。

sentences.en: Hammer the nails into the back of the frame.
sentences.cn: 把钉子锤入框子的背面。

sentences.en: Hammer-throwing for women is not yet a major event.
sentences.cn: 女子链球运动还不是主要的赛事。

sentences.en: He bashed her over the head with a hammer.
sentences.cn: 他用锤子猛击她的头部。

sentences.en: He drove in a nail with one stroke of the hammer.
sentences.cn: 他一锤就把钉子敲进去了.

sentences.en: He set a very big iron ball and a big hammer on the stage.
sentences.cn: 他在讲台上放置了一个很大很大的铁球和一把铁锤。

sentences.en: He used a hammer and chisel to chip away at the wall.
sentences.cn: 他用榔头和凿子铲墙。

sentences.en: He'll hammer some information in whether that child likes it or not.
sentences.cn: 不管那个小孩喜欢不喜欢,他要反复灌输一些知识给他.

sentences.en: His entire collection will come under the hammer at next week's sale.
sentences.cn: 他的全部收藏品將在下周的拍賣會上被拍賣.

sentences.en: I had no hammer,so I had to pound the nail in with a stone.
sentences.cn: 我没有锤子，所以只得用石头把钉子敲进去。

sentences.en: I want to hammer in a few facts if I can.
sentences.cn: 要是能够的话,我要反复强调几个事实.

sentences.en: racehorses going at it hammer and tongs.
sentences.cn: 奋力冲刺的赛马。

sentences.en: racehorses going at it hammer and tongs.
sentences.cn: 奋力冲刺的赛马。

sentences.en: She had been viciously attacked with a hammer.
sentences.cn: 有人用锤子凶狠地攻击过她。

sentences.en: She slept with a knife, a hammer, and a screwdriver under her pillow.
sentences.cn: 她在睡觉的枕头底下藏了一把刀，一个铁锤和一个螺丝起子。

sentences.en: She swung the hammer at his head with all her might.
sentences.cn: 她使出全身力气抡起榔头砸向他的脑袋。

sentences.en: The hammer slipped out of her grasp.
sentences.cn: 锤子从她的手中滑落。

sentences.en: The natives used to hammer the metal into arrowheads using heavy stones.
sentences.cn: 土著人以前总是用沉重的石头把这种金属锤打成箭头.

sentences.en: The rain was hammering against the window.
sentences.cn: 雨点不停地敲打着窗户。

sentences.en: the sound of hammering and sawing
sentences.cn: 锤打和拉锯的声音

sentences.en: The workers kneel on the ground and hammer the small stones in.
sentences.cn: 工人们跪在地上，将小石子锤进去。

sentences.en: We had to hammer and shout before they would open up.
sentences.cn: 我们不停地拍门、叫喊，他们才开了门。

sentences.en: You could smash the drawer up with a hammer.
sentences.cn: 可以用锤子把抽屉砸开。

words.tran_cn: 锤打（hammer的过去式和过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 羊角锤；木工锤；燕尾服；拔钉锤

phrases.phrase: go under the hammer 或 come under the hammer

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)有力地；热情地；猛烈地
（尤指用钢琴）笨拙而大声地演奏，敲击出

trans.tran_cn: 铁锤，榔头，链球，（拍卖时用的）木槌，音槌
trans.tran_en: the part of a gun that hits the explosive charge that fires a bullet
to hit something with a hammer in order to force it into a particular position or shape
to hit something many times, especially making a loud noise

trans.tran_cn: 击败，猛踢，猛击，轻易打败（对方）
trans.tran_en: to hit something with a hammer in order to force it into a particular position or shape

trans.tran_cn: 锤打，反复敲打，连续击打（尤指发出大声）
